Blockhouse Bay homicide: Police formally identify Stephen Thorpe, 54, as victim https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/blockhouse-bay-homicide-police-formally-identify-stephen-thorpe-54-as-victim/ZSHP3JETN5AXVNGYGSRE3KM4GU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/blockhouse-bay-homicide-police-formally-identify-stephen-thorpe-54-as-victim/ZSHP3JETN5AXVNGYGSRE3KM4GU/ Raphael FranksThorpe was a gentle scientist who was killed on a walk to search for insects and plants. Mon, 26 Aug 2024 06:05:28 +0000 Stephen Thorpe (inset) has been named as the man killed at the Blockhouse Bay Tennis Club, where police were at the scene yesterday.

Mon, 26 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A man in his 70s died from an injury suffered during a chest drain after following heart surgery.
